title: Bug 11314: Replace package name fragments should always be smaller
OB: When entering 'com.ibm.foobar' in the 'Replace package name fragments with:' field in the preferences (Java Work in progress), the package name is replaced with 'co~.ib~.foobar'.
EB: The expected behavior is that package name compression should only replace a fragment if the compressed name is actually smaller.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Open the preferences in Java Work in progress.
2. Navigate to the 'Replace package name fragments with:' field.
3. Enter 'com.ibm.foobar' in the input field.
